import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faXmark } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Task = ({ task }) => { return (
{ task.text } { task.day }
) } Task.propTypes = { task: PropTypes.object.isRequired } export default Task
